metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20470 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In bindRemoteViewsService of AppWidgetServiceImpl.java, there is a possible way to bypass background activity launch due to improper input validation. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-234013191

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
android-platform-frameworks-base package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
